info.description:
WIP. hard to unroll & grow small spir
[url]https://inktober.com/[/url]

renderpass.code:
#define rot(a)  mat2(cos(a+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                       // rotation

#define S(r,x,Y,z,R,w,l1) (                                        /* --- spiral   */    \
          a = atan(r.z,r.Y), d = 1.*length(vec2(r.Y,r.z)),                               \
          l1 = floor((d-a)/6.28)*6.28 + a,                 /* coord along spiral   */    \
          y = mod(d-a+1.,6.28)-1.-3.14,                    /* coord radial to spir */    \
          length(vec2(r.x,y)/R) - (w)  )                   /* spiral tube          */
#define L(l,Y) (                                                   /* --- sub-spiral  */ \
          r = vec3( (mod(l,.628)-.314)*6.28, Y+3.14, 3.-abs(q.z) ),/* local frame  */    \
          S(r,x,y,z,vec2(4,1),.25,l1) )

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U)
{
    float t=9.,a,d,l,l1,y,v,s,c,cf;                                          
    vec3  R = iResolution, C, N,
          D = normalize(vec3(U+U, -3.5*R.y) - R),                  // ray direction
          p = 50./R, q,r,                                          // marching point along ray 
          M = iMouse.z > 0. ? vec3(2,.5,0)-6.*(iMouse.xyz/R -.5):  // mouse camera rot
                              vec3(-.5*iTime,.6*sin(.2*iTime),0);
    
    for (O=vec4(1); O.x > 0. && t > .01; O-=.01)
        q = p, 
        q.yz *= rot(M.y),                                          // rotations
        q.xz *= rot(M.x),
        t = s = S(q,z,x,y,1.,.1+.2*l,l), l1=l,                          // fern spiral
        v = atan(q.z,y),
        t = min(t, max( L(l-iTime,y),                              // sub-spirals
                        max(abs(q.z)-8.,min(l-9.43+6.28,-r.y+.05)) )), // clamping
       // r.y+=1.+.2*l-3.14, t = min(t, length(r)-.1*l),           // spheres in local frame
        t = max(t, l-9.43 ),                                       // spiral end
        t = min(t, c = max(length(vec2(q.z,q.x+12.56))-2., q.y)),  // stem tube
        t = min(t, cf= max( L(q.y/12.56+iTime,-q.x-12.56),         // sub-spirals
                        max(max(q.y,abs(q.z)-8.),abs(r.y)-4.) )),  //   clamping
        t = min(t, length(vec3(q.x-1.,q.y,2.-abs(q.z)))-2.),       // sphere bud

        p += .5*t*D;                                               // step forward = dist to obj

    if (t==c||t==cf) l = .95+q.y/12.56+iTime, v = -atan(q.z,q.x+12.56); else l -= iTime;
    O *= (.7-.3*sin(10.*v))  * vec4(0,1,0,0) + texture(iChannel0,vec2(l,v)); // color scheme
    if (t>.01) O = .3*texture(iChannel1,q);                        // background
}
